name: Usopp
text: On Play: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

meta.notes: Card has 'SAMPLE' watermark. Rarity 'R' is visible in the bottom right corner. Power value is clearly printed as 3000. Attribute is 'Ranged' as indicated by the icon and text. No life value is printed.
